Question: KanDao Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kandao Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: QooCam 3 Ultra

- Dual 1/1.7-inch sensors, dual fisheye lenses, 4 built-in microphones, F1.6 aperture, 6-axis gyroscope, and 2.19-inch touchscreen
- Capable of capturing 8K/30fps, 5.7K/60fps, and 4K/120fps videos with instant stabilization
- Supports 10-bit HLG video recording for smooth color transitions
- Capable of capturing up to 96MP 360-degree photos with in-cam stitching and long exposure
- DNG8 file type with Raw+ Algorithm for enhanced panoramic photos and greater flexibility in post-processing and editing
- In-camera live-streaming function for easy broadcasting of immersive 360° experiences in real-time
- Real-time stitching capability during live streaming
- Additional products showcased include the Kandao Meeting Ultra and the award-winning Kandao Obsidian Pro
Summary_cn:
康道科技有限公司。

产品：QooCam 3 Ultra

- 双1/1.7英寸传感器，双鱼眼镜头，4个内置麦克风，F1.6光圈，6轴陀螺仪和2.19英寸触摸屏
- 能够以8K / 30fps，5.7K / 60fps和4K / 120fps的视频拍摄功能进行瞬时稳定
- 支持10位HLG视频录制，实现流畅的颜色过渡
- 可以通过内置拼接和长曝光技术拍摄高达96MP的360度照片
- DNG8文件类型以及原始+算法使全景照片增强，并在后期处理和编辑时提供更大的灵活性
- 机内实时直播功能，轻松广播沉浸式360°体验
- 实时拼接能力，在直播过程中
- 展示的其他产品包括Kandao Meeting Ultra和屡获殊荣的Kandao Obsidian Pro
